articles.description: 吴说获悉，NYDIG 研究指出，CME 数据显示出交易者乐观情绪的减退。6月中旬开始的现货 ETF 推动的上涨行情中，以年化回报率表示的滚动1个月期货基差收于 14% 以上。自7月初见顶以来，期货基差现已降至个位数的低点。当基差较大且为正时，通常意味着交易者表达看涨观点。https://viewemail.nydig.com/e3t/Ctc/OR+113/d2nqLx04/MX2H0yvjX9BVMPyGw9fBSx1W8fXtNV51ScNGN7jDJtR5kvg0W5BWr2F6lZ3p-N3gLh6yQ5_zMTSt7j7NgkcBW7Qgykh3tCwcFW3KpCq74jD5BlW6f5rBS1whRXfW8XZHt04hQlcfW1bFZ1q4jcbsPW3wtVWn5HltQbW7Rx2wj1FPByYN1QGl0D7dPpvW5f2jQn93Pk-1W3YNVjg8W_myyW8MDnwq4GXF9-W4B1CsY4_FlkpW9fF9pF8WlntnW6fvFyY7SbqM6W271mwq413lbdW4mvG892Wz3ThW7nSPZb162ThxW72tYx84zH7MwW2lWT8L8xXRB6VkH8mk2zM66pW84xgwx1md6bgW3DRdCD6GfQrqW4DL4bJ5xQd3ZW8dZYnD2H_yLBW3l9fNZ8rFvVWW4vJZTS64XYb1W7GblCs4jcMNtVZxmyF88R9wCW5WF3h43jT6-vW1fRbDP1J5x74W443DB92csnjZW6rtlhJ5Bnjcsf1mW4nM04

Techub NEWS: Techub News8月5日訊，Techub News從两位不同的知情人士處獲悉，加密交易所火必至少三名高管被中国警方带走调查，涉及人力、研發、財務。有員工稱接到緊急通知，要求盡快出境。此前有消息稱，某交易所的多位CTO、CHO等高管遭到中国警方调查，罪名為開設賭場罪。

articles.description:
吴说获悉，被标记为“Multichain Suspicious Address 1”昨日累积出售 189 万美元的 WOO、86 万美元的 YFI、78 万美元的 CRV、351 万美元的 LINK，并转移 418 万美元的 DAI，累积约 1300 万美元。这些出售的 Token 先是转换为 ETH，再换为 DAI USDT 等稳定币，部分稳定币仍留存在…

吴说区块链: 与 Multichain 攻击相关的可疑钱包地址在 Uniswap 上出售了价值 240 万美元的 chainlink 代币 (LINK) 和 180 万美元的 WOO Network (WOO) 代币。该钱包还收到了价值 80 万美元的 CRV 代币和价值 87 万美元的 YFI 在 Uniswap 上积极出售。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/08/04/suspicious-multichain-wallet-dumps-18m-woo-network-tokens-price-drops-8/?utm_term=organic&utm_campaign=coindesk_main&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_content=editorial

落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Fwiw you can get some pretty crazy price targets for $eth depending on how bullish you are #bitcoin and $eth relative to $btc.
Imagine $btc’s market cap at peak (ie eth/btc ratio of ~0.17) is a reasonable absolute ceiling for $eth under the most bullish scenario.


Surfer: Bitcoin 20x'd off the bottom during its 3rd cycle: $3k to $60kish.
Eth to 20x off the bottom during its 3rd cycle: $1k to $20k? 
Not inconceivable at all depending on how high #Bitcoin goes...
